member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Cross.MvxSvgCachedImageView.ReplaceStringMap
member.summary: Used to define replacement map which will be used to replace text inside SVG file (eg. changing colors values)

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Svg.Platform.SvgDataResolver.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default SVG size is read from SVG file width / height attributes You can override it by specyfing vectorWidth / vectorHeight params
member.param: If set to true use dip units.
